title: A few that don't fit my collection
author: Howe’s Hunter

posts.post_title: A few that don't fit my collection
posts.post_content:
Picked these up as part of a lot that an eBay seller wouldn't break before any bids. Looking to move these three Buffalo players individually.

[URL=http://s150.photobucket.com/user/T206ster/media/img423_zpsa9790af6.gif.html][IMG]http://i150.photobucket.com/albums/s81/T206ster/img423_zpsa9790af6.gif[/IMG][/URL]
[URL=http://s150.photobucket.com/user/T206ster/media/Buffalo-Backs_zpsb5d721ec.gif.html][IMG]http://i150.photobucket.com/albums/s81/T206ster/Buffalo-Backs_zpsb5d721ec.gif[/IMG][/URL]

Aside from the things you can readily see, Brain has a severe bend in him, visible from both sides, that makes him limp. Hold him from top or bottom, and he will droop.

Hoping to $20 each for the cards. Includes postage. Buy 2 and take $2 off total. Buy all three ... you get the idea. Or just shoot me an offer on any or all.

What better time to try and sell common cards in poor condition than when everyone is looking forward to the National?

Thanks.
I'll take White and Natress.  Email details to [url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]

posts.post_title: Moving the last three to eBay tomorrow 8/3
posts.post_content: Make an offer if you have any interest at all. Thanks.
Anyone want either or both of the other two? Let me know.
